00020 
00021 #ifndef ASL_PDEBUG_H
00022 #define ASL_PDEBUG_H
00023 
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 
00026 #define PDEBUG_ERR(fmt, arg...) fprintf(stderr, "%s(): " fmt, __func__, ## arg)
00027 #define PDEBUG_SNIP_ERR(fmt, arg...) fprintf(stderr, fmt, ## arg)
00028 #define PDEBUG_OFF(fmt, arg...)
00029 
00030 #ifdef ASL_VERBOSE_DEBUG
00031 # define ASL_DEBUG
00032 # define PVDEBUG PDEBUG_ERR
00033 # define PVDEBUG_SNIP PDEBUG_SNIP_ERR
00034 #else
00035 # define PVDEBUG PDEBUG_OFF
00036 # define PVDEBUG_SNIP PDEBUG_OFF
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #ifdef ASL_DEBUG
00040 # define PDEBUG PDEBUG_ERR
00041 # define PDEBUG_SNIP PDEBUG_SNIP_ERR
00042 #else
00043 # define PDEBUG PDEBUG_OFF
00044 # define PDEBUG_SNIP PDEBUG_OFF
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #endif // ASL_PDEBUG_H
